item.title: Meet Devin’s Rival: Here’s How You Should Work on GitHub Copilot Workspace
item.dc:creator: ross
item.description: Introduction AI is reshaping software development, and GitHub is at the forefront. In just two years, we’ve seen a dramatic shift with the introduction of GitHub Copilot, the AI-powered code completion tool for editors, boosting productivity by up to 55%. We’re pushing the boundaries even further with GitHub Copilot Workspace: the first Copilot-native developer environment. […]

item.title: Advanced RAG Technique : Langchain ReAct and Cohere
item.dc:creator: ross
item.description: Introduction This article explores Adaptive Question-Answering (QA) frameworks, specifically the Adaptive RAG strategy. It discusses how this framework dynamically selects the most suitable method for large language models (LLMs) based on query complexity. It highlights the learning objectives, features, and implementation of Adaptive RAG, its efficiency, and its integration with Langchain and Cohere LLM. The […]
item.content:encoded:

item.title: Is Coding Dead? Google’s CodeGemma 1.1 7B Explained
item.dc:creator: ross
item.description: Introduction CodeGemma 7B is a specialized open code model built on top of Gemma, a family of language models developed by Google DeepMind. It is designed for a variety of code and natural language generation tasks. The 7B model is part of the Gemma family and is further trained on more than 500 billion tokens […]
item.content:encoded:

item.title: Building Responsible AI with Guardrails AI
item.dc:creator: ross
item.description: Introduction Large Language Models (LLMs) are ubiquitous in various applications such as chat applications, voice assistants, travel agents, and call centers. However, people are increasingly using ChatGPT and other LLMs, which may provide prompts with personal identifiable information or toxic language. To protect against these […]
item.content:encoded:
